comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: These were the starting pitchers in Game 1 of the 1915 World Series, Shore coming off a great season for the Boston Red Sox and future Baseball Hall of Famer Alexander pitching and winning Game 1 for the Philadelphia Phillies. This was Alexander's fifth year of major league play in a career that would last until 1930. Game 1 was held October 8, 1915 in Philadelphia's Baker Bowl. Game 3 was held in Boston on the date on the negative and sticker of this photo, 10/11/15, but did not feature the same pitching matchup. This photo probably dates from October 8th. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1915_World_Series mlb.mlb.com/mlb/history/postseason/mlb_ws_recaps.jsp?feat... en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grover_Cleveland_Alexander en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ernie_Shore www.retrosheet.org/boxesetc/1915/YPS_1915.htm
